Talk_02:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Nope,<sp:5:0:0> nope, <sp:5:0:0>nope. Not going near <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff> anymore.


Nasty <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>. It's everywhere. <clr:0000>Making everyone sick<clr:ffff>.
Making me sick!

Glad I ate that <clr:0000>yellow plant stuff<clr:ffff> from the
gloom specialist.

Any more gloom, and I'd be canoeing down ol'
death river...

<snd:Think_00>Worked my tail off for <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff>. Kid runs circles
around Purah and Robbie. She loves research.<sp:5:0:0>
Me? I'm sick to death of chasm research.
Least I'm starting to feel better.<sp:5:0:0> But I think I'll lie
low and...<sp:5:0:0>keep lying here.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_09:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Angry_01>Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! I woke up, but everyone's
still talking about a <clr:0000>demon king<clr:ffff>.

What is this nonsense they're spouting? <sp:5:0:0>Wait.
Hang on... <sp:5:0:0>Yep, I'm still dreaming.

Tricky little dream. This means<sp:5:0:0> if I go to sleep,
I'll be back in reality...<sp:5:0:0>I think. Better sleep on it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_03:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>I did it all for <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> But I can't go near <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>
anymore. I don't care what's down there.

Nasty <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>. It's everywhere. <clr:0000>Making everyone sick<clr:ffff>.
Making me sick!

Glad I ate that <clr:0000>yellow plant stuff<clr:ffff> from the
gloom specialist.

Any more gloom, and I'd be canoeing down ol'
death river...

<snd:Think_00>Least I'm starting to feel better.<sp:5:0:0> But I think I'll lie
low and...<sp:5:0:0>keep lying here.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_05:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>Do my ears deceive me? Sweet, little <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff> is
recruiting for the chasm-research team again?

I helped <clr:0000>down there <clr:ffff>before, with that nasty <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>
all over. Made me so sick!

Glad I ate that <clr:0000>yellow plant stuff<clr:ffff> from the
gloom specialist.

Any more gloom, and I'd be canoeing down ol'
death river...

<snd:Think_00>But I want to help Josha... Kid runs circles around
Purah and Robbie with all her research.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_06:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Sweet, little <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff> is recruiting for the chasm-
research team. Wonder if she found anyone
good enough.
I helped <clr:0000>down there <clr:ffff>before, with that nasty <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>
all over. Made me so sick!

Glad I ate that <clr:0000>yellow plant stuff<clr:ffff> from the
gloom specialist.

Any more gloom, and I'd be canoeing down ol'
death river...

<snd:Sad_00>But if little <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff>'s in need, maybe I'll help again...<sp:5:0:0>
Nope, nope, nope. <sp:5:0:0>If I went again,<sp:5:0:0> I'd be a goner.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_07:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>I'd heard sweet, little <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff> is recruiting for the
<clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>-research team, so I interviewed, but I
didn't make the cut.
Well.<sp:5:0:0> Happier here, anyway. Better than dealing
with that nasty <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff> again.

I had a really rough go of it when I came into
contact with it.

Glad I ate that <clr:0000>yellow plant stuff<clr:ffff> from the
gloom specialist.

Any more gloom, and I'd be canoeing down ol'
death river...

<snd:Ease_01>Anyway, it's nobody's business but mine that
she didn't pick me. I'm going back to sleep.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
near_05: I'll pass this time for sure.
Talk_08:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Angry_01>Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! What's a <clr:0000>demon king<clr:ffff>?

dreaming again.

Tricky little dream. Which means<sp:5:0:0> if I go to sleep,
I'll be back in reality...<sp:5:0:0>I think. Better sleep on it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
